about_the_game:
Attention, please restart the game after purchase!

WHAT YOU GET

A unique avatar-slut for your deck, already at level 5! The New Year Fairy with powerful effects, fully upgraded to level 5, plus a ton of coins, loads of Viagra, and plenty of crystals. This set is not for beginners—it will seriously advance you in the game.

EXACT REWARDS

  • Epic Fairy avatar for your deck

  • 16500 Coins

  • 1100 Viagra

  • 115 Crystals

content_descriptors.notes:
This game has adult themes, language, depicting non conventional kinks, explored in healthy ways, and fictional characters depicted in sexual situations. 

All characters depicted are over the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Additional Notes: Internet required
